mapper.select: SELECT CHILDREN_NO, CHILDREN_NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, USER_NO FROM CHILDREN WHERE CHILDREN_NO IN (SELECT CHILDREN_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS K1 WHERE (K1.KINDER_NO, K1.CLASS_NAME, K1.OPENED_DATE) IN (SELECT K2.KINDER_NO, K2.CLASS_NAME, K2.OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K2 WHERE K2.TEACHER_NO = #{teacherNo}) AND DIVISION = '원생')

SELECT CLASS_NO, KINDER_NO, CLASS_NAME, OPENED_DATE, SEMESTER, DIVISION, KC.CHILDREN_NO, CHILDREN_NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, USER_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS KC JOIN CHILDREN C ON (KC.CHILDREN_NO = C.CHILDREN_NO) WHERE KC.CHILDREN_NO IN (SELECT CH.CHILDREN_NO FROM CHILDREN CH WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RETURN_HOME VALUES(SEQ_HOME_NO.NEXTVAL, #{childrenNo}, #{homeDate}, #{homeTime}, #{homeWay}, #{parentsName}, #{parentsPhone}, #{emergencyName}, #{emergencyPhone}, DEFAULT, NULL, #{writeDate})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES(SEQ_FILE_ID.NEXTVAL, 'sign', 'sign', #{dataURL}, SYSDATE, '귀가동의', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, SEQ_HOME_NO.CURRVAL, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT RH.HOME_NO, RH.CHILDREN_NO, RH.HOME_DATE, RH.HOME_TIME, RH.HOME_WAY, RH.PARENTS_NAME, RH.PARENTS_PHONE, RH.EMERGENCY_NAME, RH.EMERGENCY_PHONE, RH.READING, RH.RE_DATE, RH.WRITE_DATE, AT.FILE_PATH FROM RETURN_HOME RH JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON (RH.HOME_NO = AT.HOME_NO) WHERE RH.CHILDREN_NO IN (SELECT CHILDREN_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS K1 WHERE (K1.KINDER_NO, K1.CLASS_NAME, K1.OPENED_DATE) IN (SELECT K2.KINDER_NO, K2.CLASS_NAME, K2.OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K2 WHERE K2.TEACHER_NO = #{teacherNo}) AND DIVISION = '원생')
